attributes.action: allow criminal investigations against Members of Parliament who have blatantly defrauded the Parliamentary Expenses system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Through the course of the current media attention surrounding MP's expenses claims, it has become clear that while the majority of claims are within Parliamentary rules, there are some that are deserving of criminal investigation. We believe it would be remiss of the PM to intervene in proceedings to which all UK citizens are subject, and further degrade the public’s confidence in our politicians.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
